item.title: New Jersey Sen. Cory Booker launches overnight speech to protest Trump's agenda
item.description: New Jersey Democratic Sen. Cory Booker carried an all-night speech in protest of President Trump's agenda into Tuesday morning.

item.title: End Federal School Food Programs
item.description: State governments are better positioned to fund and run them.

item.title: Abortion Pill Reversal Saved My Son’s Life. A Pro-Life Community Saved Mine
item.description: About seven months after reversing my chemical abortion, my son arrived. I love him more than I ever feared having him.

item.title: Massachusetts judge charges ICE agent with contempt of court
item.description: Boston Municipal Court Judge Mark Summerville said it was "disturbing" to see ICE take a defendant into custody while he was still standing trial.

item.title: Radios and Lifelines
item.description: On the fate of U.S.-funded news agencies, broadcasting to people in dark places.

item.title: Detroit-Area Clerk Blows Whistle On ‘Years’ Of Ballot Trafficking, While AG Meets With Alleged Fraudster
item.description: The Hamtramck clerk alleged pervasive ballot trafficking in the city's elections. Meanwhile, Michigan's AG met with a fraud suspect.

item.title: New GOP Legislation Would Combat CCP’s Secret Police In The U.S.
item.description: Passing this legislation is crucial for safeguarding U.S. sovereignty and countering the Chinese Communist Party's encroachment and influence efforts.

item.title: Trump Is Right to Want Open Sea Lanes
item.description: Europeans navies aren’t going to deal with the problem (they barely exist), and so it falls to us.

item.description: Raising top marginal rates would be disastrous economic policy and bad politics.

item.title: Not Even Elon Musk’s Money Can Buy A Kid The Benefits Of Married Parents
item.description: The biggest loser in Elon Musk’s baby mama drama is the kid whose parents think money can buy the benefits of having kids within marriage.

item.title: SCOOP: Judge Boasberg impeachment push gains support despite House GOP leaders' resistance
item.description: A resolution to impeach U.S. District Judge James Boasberg has gained more traction in recent days.

item.title: Sorry, Mr. Vance, Things Are Not the Same as People
item.description: Imports do not raise many of the issues that we associate with immigration.
